name: Golden Trails: Hidden Object Adventure Western
name_original: Golden Trails: Hidden Object Adventure Western
description:
Welcome to the exiting world of Wild West in the gripping hidden object shootout Golden Trails: The New Western Rush!

Crafty bandits have robbed the bank in the provincial Sunnyvale. And none but you, the brave Sheriff Jack, can solve this knotty case. Search in every nook and cranny in the provincial borough, scour gold mines, Grand Canyon, wigwams, dusty ranches and more to unravel who could realize this insidious heist.

GOLDEN TRAILS: THE NEW WESTERN RUSH FEATURES
- More than 32 Wild West locations to sleuth
- 5 Unique maps opening amenities of Wild West nature
- Intriguing detective and romantic storylines
- Achievements and Game Center integration
- Dozens of iconic western characters
- Unlimited mode and Secret Mission
- Exciting Wild west story
- Try before buy! Start your adventure for free and unlock the whole game without leaving the app!

PRESS QUOTES
“Golden Trails offers way more than just a good story and a well-presented game.” @Jayisgames
“Tons to do. Great item searches. Fun trophies.” @Gamezebo
“Held my interest to play to the very end” GiN
“...the best HO app ever!! Love the story line, so much happening in every scene, stunning graphics. wonderful and fun-filled as this one!! Thanks so much!!!.” User’s review iTunes
“I absolutely love this game!!!!! It's a MUST HAVE!” User’s review@ iTunes
